Measure of lexical diversity that takes into account sample length, the number of different words used and the number of words mentioned only once. A higher value indicates greater lexical diversity.
Measure of lexical diversity by relating sample length to the number of different words used in the sample. A higher Brunet W index indicates less lexical diversity (inverted scale).
